verse:
सर्ववेदमयेनेदमात्मनात्मात्मयोनिना ।
प्रजाः सृज यथापूर्वं याश्च मय्यनुशेरते ॥

vedabase.translation: By following My instructions you can now generate the living entities as before, by dint of your complete Vedic wisdom and the body you have directly received from Me, the supreme cause of everything.

terms.sarva veda-mayena idam ātmanā ātmā: all this universe is pervaded by the all-pervading Self
terms.ātma-yoninā prajāḥ sṛja: create beings as the result of your own Self

bard.meaning: overall meaning:The all-pervading Self creates beings as the result of its own Self, as before, who follow me.
